name: Kids Monster Dentist - Free Kids Doctor Games.
name_original: Kids Monster Dentist - Free Kids Doctor Games.
description:
Kids Monster Dentist is awesome game for kids.

Crazy monsters, more fun and loads of different treatments in the best dentist game yet Dentist Office Monsters. This game will take you to a whole new adventure with more fun characters and different sets of teeth to play with.

Choose from monsters. Treat your characters with so many amazing new diffrent treatments. You can even now pluck their teeth when needed and even scrape away their dirty little germs. Use from various tools such as drills, which can remove little holes in their teeth. Even use water sprays to clean and give them a special glow. Now also brush your animal’s teeth to fight those little germs and have as much candy as you want. Dentist monsters also has a special feature bonus round where you can shoot little germs with lasers to remove them.

Shoot at so many different germs and clean your character’s teeth so it can have more candy. Become the best doctor in town and share your treatments with your friends on face book or even save them in your gallery.


-- New Special Bonus Feature-Fight with vibrant lasers
-- Scrape dirty germs with special new tools
-- Pluck unwanted and ugly teeth of your monsters
-- Drill your character’s teeth to treat holes
-- So much equipment to choose from-Now fight those minions
-- Attractive, colorful visuals
-- Share with friends – Tell them you are the best Mostar doctor and send your treatments to your friends on Face book.

Universal App For iPad and iPhone.
